metadata.title: CVE-2019-8398 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the HDF HDF5 1.10.4 library. There is an out ofbounds read in the function H5T_get_size in H5T.c.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
